name: Nishant Sinha
position: E-Commerce | Category Management | Buying & Merchandising | Consulting | Fashion | Apparel | Men | Women | Kids
about: e-Commerce enthusiast with a diverse yet holistic experience in Fashion Retail, building & scaling-up categories across Men, Women, Kids & Home. Worked with leading e-retailers in India & also in UAE/GCC market, with a proven track record in Category Management & efficiency, Buying, P&L, Business Development & Strategy, Brand Partnerships, Team Management & more.
